name: Project Symbiosis
description:
Team Synerd-getic

Play as a symbiotic parasite that is locked up in a tank in a high security containment unit facility. Merge with enemies and harness their abilities to kill/ eradicate anyone that stands in your way to make it out of your prison .

Additional/Controls:

double jump as 1st creature: space bar twice.

Things to note:This game is built upon a balancing system, as a creature that is elemental you wont be able to attack or harm soldiers that are particularly strong against your element.
